title: Missouri Firm Recalls Chicken Salad Products Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 30, 2014 Walker's Food Products Co., a North Kansas City, Mo., establishment, is recalling approximately 2,446 pounds of chicken salad products because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products...

establishment.name: Walker's Food Products Co.
establishment.address:
506 East 12th Avenue 
  North Kansas City, MO 64116
